title: Natasha (Part 2)
body:
Natasha (Part 2)

Evan watched as the space some distance away from him wrapped and twisted.

Without thinking anything, Evan looked in Eclipse's direction and used the steps of Voidgazer skill again.

Some space ripples came out of his boots and he disappeared from the place he was hovering.

Just as he disappeared, a woman in her mid sixties with a slightly wrinkled face appeared there out of nowhere.

The woman had long white hair and deep red eyes. She was wearing a long white dress and there was a cane In her hands.

She looked at the place where Evan was a moment ago before looking in the direction of Eclipse.

"Trying to run after using such powerful skills without the regard of public safety." Natasha, the president of the hunter association said in a cold voice.

She glanced at the broken glasses and the buildings which were filled with cracks before taking a step towards the place where Eclipse was fighting.
